column1: Kata Robata////One of the better sushi (and Ramen) joints not only in Houston but period.  As others have mentioned
column2: happy hour is the way to go for a drink and bite
column4: Kata really shines with omakase.  Expect to spend a few more dollars
column5: though totally worth it.  Oh and don't pass up the Uni Pasta when they have it.
